text: (Izithunywa) zathi, â€œOh! Lothi ngempela thina siyizithunywa zeNkosi yakho abasoze bafinyelela kuwena ngakho-ke hamba nomndeni wakho ngengxenye yobusuku, phakathi kwenu makungabibikho ngisho noyedwa ozobheka emumva ngaphandle konkosikazi wakho ngempela (unkosikazi wakho) uyovelelwa ilokho okuyobavelela, ngempela isithembiso sabo sisekuseni, ngakube akusondele yini ukusa na
